errors.email_already_exists: The email provided is already in use
errors.no_password: No password found, seems like you've signed in with a social provider
errors.email_verification_token_not_found: Looks like the token used to verify your email is invalid or expired

success.signed_up: You have successfuly created an account! We've sent you an email to verify your account.
success.reset_link_sent: A password reset link has been sent to your email! The link is valid for 1 hour
success.email_verified: Your email has been verified! You can now sign in

general.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up

meta.title: Login
meta.description: Log in to your BoostCart account to start selling your products online.

signUp.title: Create an account

meta.title: Sign Up
meta.description: Sign up to BoostCart to start selling your products online.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Don't worry about it, we'll help you out!
forgotPassword.successSubtitle: We've sent a password reset link to

resetPassword.title: Make a new password
resetPassword.subtitle: Make sure to remember it this time!

lockYourStore.title: Lock your store
lockYourStore.description: This makes your store password protected, so only users with the password you've set can access it.

storePassword.title: Store password
storePassword.description: This password will be used to access your store when you've locked it.

enforceEmailVerification.title: Enforce email verification
enforceEmailVerification.description: Enhance your store's security by requiring users to verify their emails.

enforceTwoFactorAuthentication.title: Enforce two-factor authentication
enforceTwoFactorAuthentication.description: Require users to add a two-step verification method to secure their accounts better.

appName.description: This is the name for your store

appUrl.description: This is the url for your store.

errors.unauthorized: Seems like you don't have the required permissions to do this.

success.message_marked_as_read: Successfuly marked the message as read!
success.message_marked_as_unread: Successfuly marked the message as unread!

deleteUser.title: Are you sure you want to delete the customer?
deleteUser.description: If you delete the customer there's no going back! Their shopping history will be kept but they wont be able to sign back in again and they would be required to make a new account.

newUser.title: Create a new customer
newUser.rolePlaceholder: Select a role for the customer
newUser.description: Add a new customer to your store

marketingEmails.title: Marketing emails
marketingEmails.description: Should the customer receive marketing emails

messages.markAsReadDescription: Should the message be marked as read or unread

deleteMessage.title: Are you sure you want to delete the message?
deleteMessage.description: If you delete the message there's no going back! It'll be deleted permanently!

deletePost.title: Are you sure you want to delete the post?
deletePost.description: If you delete the post there's no going back! It'll be deleted permanently!

defaultTitle.description: This is a default title/name used as a fallback title/name, also used for URL generation.
defaultTitle.label: Default title

slug.description: The URL-friendly version of the name. Example: https://boostcard.dev/catalog/phones

deleteFile.title: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
deleteFile.description: Deleting the file will result in losing it permanently, there's no going back! Are you really sure you want to delete it?

deleteBrand.title: Are you sure you want to delete this brand?
deleteBrand.description: Deleting the brand will result in losing it permanently, there's no going back! Are you really sure you want to delete it?

slug.description: The slug is basically the URL for the brand, this is what will be shown in the link, it's usually auto-generated by the name (above) but it can be changed to something different.

newCategory.title: Create a new category
newCategory.description: Add a new category to your store

deleteCategory.title: Are you really sure you want to delete this category?
deleteCategory.description: Doing this is permanent! There's no going back.

deleteProduct.title: Are you really you sure?
deleteProduct.description: Deleting the product is an irreversible action. There's no going back!

newProduct.title: Create a new product
newProduct.description: Add a new product to your store

status.hiddenStatus: When the status is set to "Hidden" it'll be shown only to people that have admin permissions
status.previewNotAvailable: To view this, change the status from "Draft" to "Hidden" or "Published"

marketingEmails.title: Marketing emails
marketingEmails.description: Check this if you'd like to be first when promos arrive

detailsChange.title: Update your details
detailsChange.description: You entered something wrong? Feel free to update it here

passwordChange.title: Change your password
passwordChange.description: You don't feel safe with your current password? Change it here
